properties.description: A warm welcoming space where you can come to meet with others, have free refreshments, and join in with the chats, games, jig saws or other activities. Also information about other support available if needed. We have a timetable of activities: Tuesday - All day - Food Hall. In the morning - Citizens Advice drop in sessions Wednesday - Crafts with lunch of soup & roll (free). DWP Job Club on alternate weeks in the afternoons. Thursday - East Suffolk Financial Inclusion team in the morning. Teatime Treats (free) in the afternoon. Access to books, games, jigsaws etc. available at all times.
properties.title: Number 28

properties.address: St. Andrews Church, Lowestoft, Suffolk NR32 2DQ
properties.description: Fully accessible and inclusive. Come and meet with friendly people and make friends. Free cafe. Each week we try to have help and support workers from local agencies. The Vicar is always available to be a listening ear, help direct people to advice points and always willing to pray for and with any who would find that helpful.
properties.title: Saint Andrews Warm Welcome
